Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • Card

  • public class Card
extends java.lang.Object
    Card - Playing card class representing all 52 cards of a French deck.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int NUM_CARDS
      the number of cards in the 52-card French deck
      static int NUM_RANKS
      the number of ranks in the 52-card French deck
      static int NUM_SUITS
      the number of suits in the 52-card French deck

      Given a Card String representation, return the associated Card.
      int getCardId()
      Return unique integer card identification number according to "suit-major" ordering where cards are ordered A, 2, ..., K within suits that are ordered alphabetically.

        Return whether or not the card is an ace.
        Returns:
        whether or not the card is an ace

      • getCardId

        public int getCardId()
        Return unique integer card identification number according to "suit-major" ordering where cards are ordered A, 2, ..., K within suits that are ordered alphabetically. This identification number is the 0-based suit integer times the number of ranks plus the 0-based rank number.
        Returns:
        the 0-based suit integer times the number of ranks plus the 0-based rank number
